channel.title: test on darcy's
channel.description: Recent content in test on darcy's

item.title: test.SoftwarePainter
item.description: test.SoftwarePainter # import "fyne.io/fyne/v2/test" Usage # type SoftwarePainter # type SoftwarePainter interface { Paint(fyne.Canvas) image.Image } SoftwarePainter describes a simple type that can render canvases

item.title: test.WindowlessCanvas
item.description: test.WindowlessCanvas # import "fyne.io/fyne/v2/test" Usage # type WindowlessCanvas # type WindowlessCanvas interface { fyne.Canvas Padded() bool Resize(fyne.Size) SetPadded(bool) SetScale(float32) } WindowlessCanvas provides functionality for a canvas to operate without a window func NewCanvas # func NewCanvas() WindowlessCanvas NewCanvas returns a single use in-memory canvas used for testing func NewCanvasWithPainter # func NewCanvasWithPainter(painter SoftwarePainter) WindowlessCanvas NewCanvasWithPainter allows creation of an in-memory canvas with a specific painter.
